email_invalid: Email must be a valid email address
username_invalid_characters: Username can only contain letters and numbers
username_length: Username must be between 3 and 255 characters
password_weak: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
code6_length: Verification code must be 6 characters long
code6_not_numeric: Verification code must be a 6-digit number
fullname_length: Full name must be between 1 and 255 characters
fullname_not_string: Full name must be a string
roles_exclusion_message: The following roles are not allowed: {roles}
roles_no_exclusion_allowed: No roles are allowed to be excluded
roles_invalid_values: Each value in roles must be one of the following values: {allowedRoles}
roles_min_size: Roles must have at least one role
account_already_soft_deleted: Account with ID {id} is already soft-deleted
account_not_soft_deleted: Account with ID {id} is not soft deleted
account_restore_error: Account with ID {id} could not be restored due to a database error
account_already_blocked: Account with ID {id} is already blocked
account_not_blocked: Account with ID {id} is not blocked
verification_code_sent: Verification code sent to your email.
two_factor_enabled: Two-factor authentication enabled. Please verify using your Authenticator App.
account_not_verified: This account has not been verified.
two_factor_authentication_enabled: Login successful. Two-Factor Authentication is enabled. Please log in using your OTP code.
two_factor_already_enabled: Two-factor authentication is already enabled. If you want to reset it, please disable it first.
two_factor_authentication_incomplete: Two-factor authentication setup is incomplete. Disable and re-enable.
two_factor_authentication_disabled: Two-factor authentication setup is incomplete or already disabled.
two_fa_not_enabled: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is not enabled for this account.
email_or_username_required: Email or username must be provided.
account_updated: Your account has been updated successfully
language_or_device_token_required: You must provide either a language or a device token.
entity_not_found: The requested item could not be found.
password_recently_changed: You recently changed your password. Please log in again.
logged_in_after_token_issued: You have logged in after the token was issued. Please log in again.
logged_out_after_token_issued: You have logged out after the token was issued. Please log in again.
device_token_not_found: Device token with entity_id {entity_id} not found
google_linked_account: This account is linked to Google. Please log in using Google or reset your password.
firebase_device_token_string: Firebase device token must be a string.
firebase_device_token_length: Firebase device token must be between 1 and 255 characters long.
lang_enum: The language must be one of the allowed values: {allowedValues}.
old_password_string: Old Password must be a string
